name: Acorn Squad
description: Acorn Squad is an ordinary 2D shooter with nice graphics that pleases your eye. In the game, you can take on the role of the captain of the squad and destroy your enemies. You can choose the fighters with whom you will fight together. You are also given a choice of weapons with which you will chop your enemies down to atoms. The goal of the game is to complete the levels in the least amount of time. During the passage you will be accompanied by music and special effects.
